page.title: 07The May Queen
page.content: Every year there is a carnival called the May Queen which lasts for three weeks. When we have walked around Beckenham we go to Beckenham recreation ground where the May Queens are blessed and crowned. After walking around Hayes we go to Hayes Common where we parade round the green and the London May Queen is blessed and crowned. The West Wickham May Queen has a flower festi- val; we have one posie of flowers each. We walk to a church where we are blessed and then go to an old people's home to give them the flowers. In June or July we have the Mayor's tea party and attend a couple of fetes. Before you are a May Queen you have to be an attendant for so many years then a crownbearer and prince for one year each. When you are crownbearer you cannot drop out of being the May Queen. Lisa Moon, Hawes Down
